title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7423.5 - Restrictions on correspondence
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7423.5 - Restrictions on correspondence

State Regulations

Nothing contained in this Part shall be deemed to prevent
the facility director, or person acting in that capacity, from establishing a
list of correspondents with whom residents shall be prohibited from
corresponding in order to protect the safety, security, or good order of the
facility, or the safety, security, or the health of a person. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7423.5

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter III
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
